content: Which French fashion designer founded his eponymous luxury brand in 1946 and is known for creating the "New Look" silhouette?

The French fashion designer you're referring to is Christian Dior. He founded his eponymous luxury brand, Christian Dior, in 1946. Dior is renowned for introducing the "New Look" silhouette in 1947, which revolutionized post-World War II fashion with its emphasis on a cinched waist, full skirts, and luxurious fabrics. This design marked a departure from the more practical and austere styles that were prevalent during the war years.
